articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American Airlines cuts outlook, says chief commercial officer is leaving - CNBC
articles.description: American said it expects unit revenues to fall as much as 6% in the second quarter from a year earlier.
articles.content:
American Airlines slashed its sales outlook on Tuesday. The company has also let go of its chief commercial officer, Vasu Raja. He will leave his position next month.
American Airlines said it expec… [+1982 chars]

articles.title: American arrested in Turks and Caicos over 9 mm ammo found in bag sentenced to time served and $9,000 fine - CBS News
articles.description: Tyler Wenrich was facing a potential mandatory minimum sentence of 12 years in prison in the Turks and Caicos Islands.
articles.content: Another American who was arrested in the Turks and Caicos Islands for possessing ammunition was sentenced to time served and a $9,000 fine on Tuesday, officials said. Tyler Wenrich was facing a poten… [+4592 chars]

articles.title: "We Don't Accept Nakedness": Nigeria's First Lady Slams Celebs After Meghan Markle's Visit - NDTV
articles.description: Teenagers and young adults, Ms Tinubu suggested, should dress modestly and reject the looks made famous by American celebrities.
articles.content:
Ms Markle highlighted her Nigerian heritage during the visit to the country.
